page.title: 16BRENDON HILL CRAFTS
page.content: At Sminhays there are the remains of the old mining cottages. On one side of the road they have all but disappeared, only the foundations remaining but on the west side of the road they have been renovated and now provide the home for Brendon Hill Crafts. Brendon Hill Crafts is a family business run by a husband and wife, he is an artist and she makes and sells preserves, fudge and other home made sweets. They also sell honey which is made by a friend. There are three terraced cottages here, one is lived in by the artist and his wife, the centre cottage is used as a studio and the third is used as a holiday cottage and only occupied at weekends and at times in the summer.
